parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the DPS can cause the vehicle to lose power steering assist, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potential injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The power steering warning indicator illuminates
the vehicle veers into other lanes
the steering locks up or becomes difficult to turn
the vehicle requires excessive force to steer
and the DPS unit needs to be replaced.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering system can cause the vehicle to lose control, leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: The steering seizes or locks up
the vehicle veers into other lanes
the steering becomes difficult to turn
and the vehicle requires excessive force to steer.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electrical system can cause the vehicle to lose power, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: Constant flashing of warning lights
loss of power before reaching third gear
check engine
DPS
VSS
and ABS warnings
rear lights suddenly going out.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The design flaw in the rear fender support can cause the tail light harness to ground out, leading to a loss of rear lights, and potentially causing accidents or injuries.
symptoms: Rear lights suddenly going out
fender supports separating
tail light harness grounding out.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The manufacturer's failure to address warranty claims and repair issues can lead to financial burdens on the customer, loss of trust, and potential safety risks.
symptoms: Rejection of warranty claims
lack of response to customer emails
failure to repair or replace defective parts.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: An electrical fire can cause damage to the vehicle, and potentially lead to injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Flames or sparks emanating from the vehicle
white smoke coming from the front of the vehicle
sudden loss of vehicle functionality.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A broken backrest can cause the passenger to fall off the vehicle, leading to serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Cracks or breaks in the backrest assembly
instability or weakness in the backrest
failure of the backrest to provide adequate support for the passenger.
